name: Sausage Sports Club
overview: Sausage Sports Club is a physics game about floppy animals playing sports! Play solo or couch co-op with up to 4 friends in Adventure Mode! Compete, make friends, and explore the toy-filled Overworld as you make your way through a season of the hit reality show Sausage Sports Club. Having a party? Perfect! Up to 8 players can compete or play together in Free Play! Any way you play, you’ll unlock tons of customizations in characters, skins, and hats.
